channel.title: Atticus Emilsson
channel.description: Latest blog posts from Atticus Emilsson

item.title: Tempora obscura
item.description: Assets used are public domain and did not necessitate reference/attribution 01-MAR-2025 THE SCALE AND INFLUENCE OF GOVERNMENT OMNISCIENCE ATTICUS EMILSSON The human race and it’s affinity towards progress has potentiated corporate greed and sowed distrust between governing bodies and their constituents (albeit unexpectedly). Among this progress lies technological advancements which perpetuate the in-place powers and rules of society. It is virtually impossible to sufficiently interface with modern technology and contemporary society without sacrificing one’s privacy to some extent.
